name: Max Verstappen
bio: Four-time World Champion. Aggressive racing style, excels in wet and difficult conditions. Strong on qualifying and race pace.

name: Lewis Hamilton
bio: Seven-time champion, record wins holder. Known for consistency, versatility, and resilience over many seasons.

name: Charles Leclerc
bio: Exceptional qualifier, smooth style. Drives with precision under pressure and often maximizes performance of the car.

name: Lando Norris
bio: Young and adaptable. Known for good racecraft, feedback to team, mental strength and reaction speed.

name: Oscar Piastri
bio: Rookie champion turned F1 frontrunner. Fast in qualifying, good consistency, strong in high pressure moments.

name: George Russell
bio: Strong qualifier, especially in midfield. Calm under pressure, good tyre management and steady improvement.

name: Andrea Kimi Antonelli
bio: Highly rated young talent. Excels in junior formulas; promising future in F1 with great technical learning ability.

name: Alexander Albon
bio: Experienced driver with stints in top teams. Good in mixed conditions, provides solid feedback to team.

name: Carlos Sainz
bio: Consistency and racecraft specialist. Experienced in multiple teams; good at overtaking and tyre conservation.

name: Isack Hadjar
bio: Young and aggressive. Strong in qualifying, showing good potential and speed gains race to race.

name: Yuki Tsunoda
bio: Aggressive racer. Often takes risks, good lightning pace. Learning consistency under pressure.

name: Pierre Gasly
bio: Experienced mid-field racer. Strong in tyre strategy and in wet conditions. Reliable in scoring points.

name: Franco Colapinto
bio: Rookie showing promise in junior classes. Has raw pace; consistency will be key to his development.

name: Esteban Ocon
bio: Solid and experienced mid-field driver. Good in adverse conditions. Often delivers over expected.

name: Oliver Bearman
bio: Rookie with potential. Strong performances in junior formulas, working on consistency at F1 level.

name: Nico Hülkenberg
bio: Veteran driver returning. Experienced in many teams. Good at maximizing limited opportunities.

name: Lance Stroll
bio: Experienced, often competitive in midfield. Good in tricky conditions, decent at preserving tyres.

name: Fernando Alonso
bio: Veteran legend. Known for racecraft, adaptability, fitness and ability to extract performance from any car.

name: Liam Lawson
bio: Young driver on the rise. Strong performances in junior categories; gaining experience in F1.
